message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $110. I think it would be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of something more around $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we settle at $100? It's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was really hoping to get it for a bit cheaper. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
